<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/afb-jahan-mia-md-vs-chairman-national-board-of-revenue-and-others-1997">AFB Jahan Mia (Md) Vs. Chairman, National Board of Revenue and others, 1997</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Administrative Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  1996
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  1996
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  49 DLR (AD) (1997) 122
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  AFB Jahan Mia (Md)
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Chairman, National Board of Revenue and others
			</p>
		</div>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/gm-postal-insurance-eastern-region-dhaka-and-another-vs-abm-abu-taher">GM, Postal Insurance, Eastern Region, Dhaka and another Vs. A.B.M. Abu Taher</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/md-anwar-hossain-vs--superintendent-of-police-khulna-and-others">Md. Anwar Hossain Vs.  Superintendent of Police, Khulna and others</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Administrative Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2009
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2009
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  VI ADC (2009) 780
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Md. Anwar Hossain
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/joynul-karim--ors-vs-the-state--another-4-lnj-ad-2015-153">Joynul Karim & ors. Vs. The State & another [4 LNJ AD (2015) 153]</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2015
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2015
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  4 LNJ AD (2015) 153
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Joynul Karim & others
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/secretary-ministry-of-defence-and-others--vs--abdul-mannan-lasker-and-another">Secretary, Ministry of Defence and others  Vs.  Abdul Mannan Lasker and another</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Administrative Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2004
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2004
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  1 ADC (2004) 555
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Secretary, Ministry of Defence and others
			</p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/shahid-ullah--shahid-and-others-vs-the-state-3-lnj-ad-2014-15">Shahid Ullah @ Shahid and others Vs. The State, 3 LNJ AD (2014) 15</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Confessional Statement, Commutation of Sentence, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2014
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/mobarak-ali--vs-bd-house-building-finance-corporation--another-">Mobarak Ali  Vs. BD House Building Finance Corporation & another </a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Administrative Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2003
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2003
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  55 DLR 2003(AD) 21
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Mobarak Ali
			</p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/the-state-vs-siddiqur-rahman-and-another-3-lnj-ad-2014-110">The State Vs. Siddiqur Rahman and another, 3 LNJ (AD) (2014) 110</a>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/umme-shaheda-akhter-rina-and-others-vs-ayub-ali-and-others-2-lnj-ad-2013-129">Umme Shaheda Akhter Rina and others Vs. Ayub Ali and others, 2 LNJ (AD) (2013) 129</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Appointment of Receiver, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2013
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2013
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  2 LNJ (AD) (2013) 129
			</p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/government-of-bangladesh-vs-the-kothari-fermentation-and-biochem-ltd-and-another-20161-lnj-ad-27">Government of Bangladesh Vs. The Kothari Fermentation and Biochem Ltd. and another, 2016(1) LNJ (AD) 27</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Arbitration/Mediation, Limitation, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2016
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2016
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  2016(1) LNJ (AD) 27
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Government of Bangladesh
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  The Kothari Fermentation and Biochem Ltd. and another
			</p>
		</div>
		<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/bangladesh-power-development-board-and-others-vs-ms-arab-contractor-bd-ltd-and-others-vi-adc-2009-952">Bangladesh Power Development Board and others Vs. M/s. Arab Contractor, (BD) Ltd and others, VI ADC (2009) 952</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Arbitration/Mediation, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2009
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2009
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  VI ADC (2009) 952
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Bangladesh Power Development Board and others
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  M/s. Arab Contractor (BD) Ltd and others
			</p>
		</div>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/state-bank-of-india-vs-saudi-bangladesh-industrial-and-investment-co-ltd-and-another-vi-adc-2009-37">State Bank of India Vs. Saudi-Bangladesh Industrial and Investment Co. Ltd. and another, VI ADC (2009) 37</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/arif-a-shekha-and-others-vs-secretary-ministry-of-industries-and-another-59-dlr-ad-2007-198">Arif A. Shekha and others Vs. Secretary, Ministry of Indus­tries and another, 59 DLR (AD) (2007) 198</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Abandoned Property, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2007
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2007
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  59 DLR (AD) (2007) 198
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Arif A. Shekha and others
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Secretary, Ministry of Indus­tries and another
			</p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/md-abdur-rouf-vs-judge-of-artha-rin-adalat-no1-dhaka-vii-adc-2010-548-1">Md. Abdur Rouf Vs. Judge of Artha Rin Adalat No.1, Dhaka, VII ADC (2010) 548</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Artha Rin, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2010
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/superintendent-engineer-rhd-sylhet--others-vs-md-eunus--brother-pvt-ltd--ors-vi-adc-2009-736">Superintendent Engineer, RHD Sylhet & others Vs. Md. Eunus & Brother (Pvt) Ltd. & ors, VI ADC (2009) 736</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Civil Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2009
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2009
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  VI ADC (2009) 736
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Superintendent Engineer, RHD Sylhet and others

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/afm-shah-alam-vs-mujibul-huq-and-others-41-dlr-ad-1989-68">A.F.M. Shah Alam Vs. Mujibul Huq and Others, 41 DLR (AD) (1989) 68</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/mazharul-huq-vs-returning-officer-double-moorings-27-dlr-ad-1975-11">Mazharul Huq Vs. Returning Officer, Double Moorings, 27 DLR (AD) (1975) 11</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Election Matter, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  1975
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  1975
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  27 DLR (AD) (1975) 11
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Mazharul Huq
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/government-of-bangladesh-vs-messres-a-t-j-industries-ltd-and-others-28-dlr-ad-1976-120">Government of Bangladesh Vs. Messres A. T. J. Industries Ltd. and others, 28 DLR (AD) (1976) 120</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Abandoned Property, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  1976
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/md-sona-mia-vs-collector-of-customs-chittagong-and-others-27-dlr-ad-1975-82">Md. Sona Mia Vs. Collector of Customs, Chittagong and others, 27 DLR (AD) (1975) 82</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Notice,
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  27 DLR (AD) (1975) 82
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Md. Sona Mia
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Collector of Customs, Chittagong
			</p>
		</div>
		<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/elias-md-vs-jesmin-sultana-51-dlr-ad-1999-99">Elias (Md) Vs. Jesmin Sultana, 51 DLR (AD) (1999) 99</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Family Law,

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/utpal-kanti-das-vs-monju-rani-das-50-dlr-ad-1998-47">Utpal Kanti Das Vs. Monju Rani Das, 50 DLR (AD) (1998) 47</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Hindu Law, Family Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  1998
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  1998
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  50 DLR (AD) (1998) 47
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Utpal Kanti Das
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/commissioner-of-taxes-dhaka-west-zone-dhaka-vs-shahabuddin-ahmed-42-dlr-ad-1990-162">Commissioner of Tax­es, Dhaka (West) Zone, Dhaka Vs. Shahabuddin Ahmed, 42 DLR (AD) (1990) 162</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Income Tax, Interpretation of Statute, Constitutional Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  1990
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  1990
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  42 DLR (AD) (1990) 162
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Commissioner of Tax­es
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Shahabuddin Ahmed
			</p>
		</div>
		<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/karnaphuli-rayon-and-chemical-ltd-vs-the-collector-of-central-excise---land-customs-east-zone-ctg-28-dlr-ad-1976-72">Karnaphuli Rayon and Chemical Ltd. Vs. The Collector of Central Excise  & Land Customs, East Zone, Ctg., 28 DLR (AD) (1976) 72</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Fiscal Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  1976
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  1976
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>   28 DLR (AD) (1976) 72
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/national-board-of-revenue-vs-dulal-chandra-bhoumik-vii-adc-2010-584">National Board of Revenue Vs. Dulal Chandra Bhoumik, VII ADC (2010) 584</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Customs,
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2010
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2010
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  VII ADC (2010) 584
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  National Board of Revenue
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Dulal Chandra Bhoumik
			</p>
		</div>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/sadaruddin-ahmed-chisty-vs-bangladesh-and-others-50-dlr-ad-1998-119">Sadaruddin Ahmed Chisty Vs. Bangladesh and others, 50 DLR (AD) (1998) 119</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  1998
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  1998
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  50 DLR (AD) (1998) 119
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/abdul-mannan-talukder-vs-bangladesh-house-building-finance-corporation-42-dlr-ad-1990-104">Abdul Mannan Taluk­der Vs. Bangladesh House Buil­ding Finance Corpora­tion, 42 DLR (AD) (1990) 104</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Labour Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  1990
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  1990
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  42 DLR (AD) (1990) 104
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Abdul Mannan Taluk­der
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Bangladesh House Buil­ding Finance Corpora­tion
			</p>
		</div>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/general-manager-jamuna-oil-company-ltd-vs-chairman-labour-court-53-dlr-ad-2001-28">General Manager, Jamuna Oil Company Ltd. Vs. Chairman, Labour Court, 53 DLR (AD) (2001) 28</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Labour Law, 
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/sabita-dutta-vs-manager-cinema-palace-chittagong-and-another-51-dlr-ad-1999-215">Sabita Dutta Vs. Manager, Cinema Palace Chittagong and another, 51 DLR (AD) (1999) 215</a>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/mahbubur-rahman-and-others-vs-taslimuddin-ahmad-and-others-54-dlr-ad-2002-97">Mahbubur Rahman and others Vs. Taslimuddin Ahmad and others, 54 DLR (AD) (2002) 97</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Administrative Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2002
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2002
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/momin-miah-vs-moinuddin-hossain-42-dlr-ad-1990-17">Momin Miah Vs. Moinuddin Hossain, 42 DLR (AD) (1990) 17</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Law of Contract, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  1990
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  1990
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  42 DLR (AD) (1990) 17
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Momin Miah
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Moinuddin Hossain
			</p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/director-general-of-food-vs-al-falah-shipping-lines-limited-and-others-vii-adc-2010-189">Director General of Food Vs. Al-Falah Shipping Lines Limited and others, VII (ADC) (2010) 189</a>
			</h2>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">

			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/md-sajjad-hossain-vs-state-vii-adc-2010-356">Md. Sajjad Hossain Vs. State, VII ADC (2010) 356</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Criminal Trail, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2010
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2010
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  VII ADC (2010) 356
			</p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/administrator-gammon-bangladesh-ltd-vs-tota-mia-and-others-i-adc-2004-427">Administrator, Gammon Bangladesh Ltd. Vs. Tota Mia and others, I ADC (2004) 427</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Procedural Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2004
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2004
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  I ADC (2004) 427
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Administrator, Gammon Bangladesh Ltd.
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Tota Mia and others
			</p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/abdul-mannan-vs-md-sohrab-hossain-and-others-v-adc-2008-250">Abdul Mannan Vs. Md. Sohrab Hossain and others, V ADC (2008) 250</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/abdus-sukkur-and-others-vs-mohammad-younus-and-others-iv-adc-2007-654">Abdus Sukkur and others Vs. Mohammad Younus and others, IV ADC (2007) 654</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Partition, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2007
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/amjad-ali-and-another-vs-dud-banu-and-other-v-adc-2008-339">Amjad Ali and another Vs. Dud Banu and other, V ADC (2008) 339</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Pre-emption, Property Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2008
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2008
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  V ADC (2008) 339
			</p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/boalkhali-sirajul-islam-college-vs-al-haj-ahmed-hossain-chowdhury-and-others--iv-adc-2007-860">Boalkhali Sirajul Islam College Vs. Al-haj Ahmed Hossain Chowdhury and others,  IV ADC (2007) 860</a>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/md-mafiz-and-others-vs-bangladesh">Md. Mafiz and others Vs Bangladesh</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">

			</p>

		</p>
	</div>
</article>
<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/khursheda-jahan-vs-syada-shafinaz-jahan-and-others-i-adc-2004-310">Khursheda Jahan Vs. Syada Shafinaz Jahan and others, I ADC (2004) 310</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Pre-emption,Land Law,Property Law,
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2004
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2004
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  I ADC (2004) 310
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/kulsuma-khatun-vs-rahman-sobhan-14-blc-ad-2009-27">Kulsuma Khatun Vs. Rahman Sobhan, 14 BLC (AD) (2009) 27</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  summon, Exparte Decree, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2009
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2009
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  14 BLC (AD) (2009) 27
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Kulsuma Khatun 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Rahman Sobhan
			</p>
		</div>

	<header class="blog_entry-header">

			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/harunullah-akhand-vs-abdul-latif-and-others-vi-adc-2009-243">Harunullah Akhand Vs. Abdul Latif and others, VI ADC (2009) 243</a>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/mozharul-islam-chowdhury-advocate-vs-dilip-kumar-roy-and-others">Mozharul Islam Chowdhury, Advocate Vs. Dilip Kumar Roy and others</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Declaration of Title, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2009
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2009
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  17 BLT (AD) (2009) 150
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Mozharul Islam Chowdhury, Advocate
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Dilip Kumar Roy and others
			</p>
		</div>
		<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/mst-esarunnessa-bibi-vs-md-amir-hossain">Mst. Esarunnessa Bibi Vs. Md. Amir Hossain</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Property Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  1986
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  1986
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  38 DLR (AD) (1986) 1
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Mst. Esarunnessa Bibi
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Md. Amir Hossain
			</p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/noor-jahan-begum-and-another-vs-golam-mostafa-and-others">Noor Jahan Begum and another Vs. Golam Mostafa and others</a>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/radha-krishna-jogani-agarwalla-vs-dwarka-das-agarawalla--others">Radha Krishna Jogani (Agarwalla) Vs. Dwarka Das Agarawalla & others</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Property Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  1984
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  1984
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  36 DLR (AD) (1984) 253
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Radha Krishna Jogani (Agarwalla)

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/shahin-reza-and-others-vs-abdul-hamid--others">Shahin Reza and others Vs. Abdul Hamid & others</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Property Law, 
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/united-leather-international-vs-artha-rin-adalat-and-others">United Leather International Vs. Artha Rin Adalat and others</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Property Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2009
			</p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/ismail-ullah-being-dead-his-heirs-bazidullah-and-others-vs-sukumar-chandra-das-and-others">Ismail Ullah, being dead his heirs Bazidullah and others Vs. Sukumar Chandra Das and others</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Property Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  1986
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  1986
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  38 DLR (AD) (1986) 125
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Ismail Ullah, being dead his heirs Bazidullah and others
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Sukumar Chandra Das and others
			</p>
		</div>
		<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/maherunnessa-khatun-vs-abdul-latif--another">Maherunnessa Khatun Vs. Abdul Latif & another</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">

			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Property Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2009
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2009
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  VI ADC (2009) 783
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Md. Abdul Wahab
			</p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/md-ebadullah-bepari-vs-nikhil-chandra-das">Md. Ebadullah Bepari Vs. Nikhil Chandra Das</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Property Law, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  1985
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  1985
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  37 DLR (AD) (1985) 174
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Md. Ebadullah Bepari
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Nikhil Chandra Das
			</p>
		</div>

<article class="blog_entry">

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/md-abdul-muttalib-vs-md-abdul-wahab">Md. Abdul Muttalib Vs. Md. Abdul Wahab</a>

		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/noorjahan-begum-and-others-vs-aminul-huq-and-others-2017-1-lnj-ad-27">Noorjahan Begum and others Vs. Aminul Huq and others 2017 (1) LNJ (AD) 27</a>

		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/dr-khairun-nahar-and-others-vs-professor-dr-iqbal-arshalan-and-others-2017-2-lnj-ad-77">Dr. Khairun Nahar and others Vs. Professor Dr. Iqbal Arshalan and others 2017 (2) LNJ (AD) 77</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Writ Jurisdiction
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2017
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2017
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/md-pear-ali-vs-md-abdul-hai-and-others-2018-1-lnj-ad-04">Md. Pear Ali Vs. Md. Abdul Hai and others 2018 (1) LNJ (AD) 04</a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Limitation
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2017
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2017
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  2018 (1) LNJ (AD) 04
			</p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/bangladesh-and-others-vs-md-abdus-satter-and-others-surendra-kumar-sinha-cj">Bangladesh and others Vs. Md. Abdus Satter and others, (Surendra Kumar Sinha, CJ.) </a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Constitution of Bangladesh 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2015
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2015
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  2019(1) LNJ
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  Government of Bangladesh, represented by the Secretary, Ministry of Home Affairs Bangladesh Secretariat, Dhaka and others
			</p>
			<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/the-state-vs-begum-khaleda-zia-muhammad-imman-ali-j">The State Vs. Begum Khaleda Zia, (Muhammad Imman Ali, J.) </a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Code of Criminal Procedure  
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2018
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2018
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  2018(2) LNJ (AD)      
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  The State  
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Begum Khaleda Zia 
			</p>
		</div>
		<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/state-vs-fazlur-rahman-alias-badal-and-others-md-nuruzzaman-j">State Vs. Fazlur Rahman alias Badal and others, (Md. Nuruzzaman, J.) </a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Constitution of Bangladesh, 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2018
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2018
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  2019(1) LNJ (AD)    
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  State  
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Fazlur Rahman alias Badal 
			</p>
		</div>
		<p>

<article class="blog_entry">
	<header class="blog_entry-header">
		<div class="blog_entry-header-inner">
			<h2 class="blog_entry-title">
				<a rel="bookmark" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/lawyer_ci/case/president-man-comm-and-ors-vs-mrs-kawser-parvin-and-ors">President, Man. Comm. and ors.Vs. Mrs. Kawser Parvin and ors </a>
			</h2>
		</div>
		<!--blog_entry-header-inner-->
	</header>
	<div class="entry-content">
		<div class="entry-content">
			<p>
				<b>Subject:</b>  Constitution of Bangladesh 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Case Year:</b>  2019
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  2019
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Citation:</b>  2019(2) LNJ (AD) 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Appellant:</b>  The President, Managing Committee, Bangshal Girls High School and another 
			</p>
			<p>
				<b>Respondent:</b>  Mrs. Kawser Parvin and others
			</p>
		</div>
		<p>
